# configuration

**Instance Property**

The configuration data for creating the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var configuration: UISceneConfiguration { get }
```

## Discussion

Before the creation of a scene, UIKit creates a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISceneConfiguration] object and fills it with details from your app’s `Info.plist` file. (Normally, UIKit chooses the first scene of the appropriate type listed in your scene configuration data.) If the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIApplicationDelegate/application(_:configurationForConnecting:options:)] method of your app delegate returns a new [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISceneConfiguration] object, UIKit copies that object to this property.

## Getting the scene configuration details

- **UISceneConfiguration**: Information about the objects and storyboard for UKit to use when creating a particular scene.
